author: COMSOL
description: This is a benchmark problem involving stick-slip friction of a ring rolling inside another ring. The displacement of the inner ring is computed and compared to the analytical result.
label: contacting_rings.mph
name: root

settings.description: Add contact status to solver log
settings.name: isContactLog

settings.name: xc

settings.name: RigSolWeakConstraints

text
settings.value: Changes made to these settings only take effect when the default solver is generated.

title: Friction Between Contacting Rings
